## func [GenerateEd25519KeyPair](<https://github.com/opensourceCertifications/linux/blob/main/monitor/go/shared/library/keypair/generate_key.go#L13>)

```go
func GenerateEd25519KeyPair() (privatePEM, publicPEM []byte, err error)
```

GenerateEd25519KeyPair returns a freshly generated Ed25519 private & public key, both PEM\-encoded.
